price: (26) Then I seized the ones who disbelieved, and how [terrible] was My reproach.
arabic: ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: thumma akhadhtu alladhīna kafarū fakayfa kāna nakīri
